actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the withdrawal of second-class and third-class mailing permits of mail users who have used these permits systematically in the mailing of obscene, sadistic, lewd, or pandering mail matter.

summary.text: Provides for the withdrawal of second-class and third-class mailing permits of mail users who have used these permits systematically in the mailing of obscene, sadistic, lewd, or pandering mail matter, upon evidence satisfactory to the Postmaster General after a hearing under the Administrative Procedure Act. (Adds 39 U.S.C. 4010)

titles.title: A bill to provide for the withdrawal of second-class and third-class mailing permits of mail users who have used these permits systematically in the mailing of obscene, sadistic, lewd, or pandering mail matter.
